price: 74. Except Iblîs (Satan): he was proud[1] and was one of the disbelievers.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa is'takbara wakāna mina al-kāfirīna
